Robert Anthony Rodriguez, better known by his stage name Robert Rodriguez, has a net worth of more than $40 million USD. While working as a film director, screenwriter, producer, editor, actor, cinematographer, and even musician, Robert Rodriguez has won this honour. He has always been interested in filmmaking and photography since he was a child.
